source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_00<tab>Nashmeira is ready to move on to new environs.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_00<tab>Nashmeira semble être impatiente d'être sur la route.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_01<tab>Gridania is the next stop on Troupe Falsiam's itinerary, yet Nashmeira has a suspicion that troubling events of the sort you bore witness to in Ul'dah might be plaguing your next destination as well. Upon your arrival in the Twelveswood, first make your way to the Adders' Nest, that you and Nashmeira might glean helpful information about any recent happenings.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_01<tab>Craignant d'y trouver des problèmes similaires à ceux d'Ul'dah, vous avez décidé de vous renseigner sur la situation à Gridania avant le départ.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_02<tab>Mistress Nashmeira's portentous premonitions prove true, as Lieutenant Gavin of the Twin Adders gravely informs you that Duskwight malcontents have been openly planning violent uprisings just outside Gridania's borders. Convinced that she must see what is happening with her own eyes, Nashmeira succeeds─with your support─in convincing the officer to allow Troupe Falsiam to investigate the matter. Accompany your companions to the local watering hole and gather what information you can.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_02<tab>Des mercenaires ont été vus en train de préparer quelque rébellion dans la forêt, et Nashmeira a décidé de vous accompagner dans votre enquête. Allez parler à Nashmeira, au bar “Le Choix de Buscarron”.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_03<tab>Rumor has it Duskwight troublemakers have been sighted in the area performing odd dances. It is becoming increasingly clear that the similarity to the events in Ul'dah are more than a coincidence─and that Mistress Nashmeira knows more than she is letting on. Make for the Upper Paths and keep lookout for any suspicious personages.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_03<tab>Nashmeira a entendu dire que les mercenaires pratiquaient une danse étrange, et veut aller voir de quoi il retourne le plus vite possible. Rendez-vous à l'endroit indiqué, dans la Forêt du sud.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_04<tab>Upon being confronted by seemingly mad Duskwights, Mistress Nashmeira suddenly performs a curious dance, causing eerie clouds of dark aether to emerge from within their bodies. Defeat them and cast out the shadow!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_04<tab>Nashmeira s'est blessée en dansant, mais a tout de même réussi à faire apparaître l'être éthéré qui avait pris possession du cœur des mercenaires. À vous de le terrasser.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_05<tab>Wielding your dancing abilities and martial skills both, you succeed in freeing the stricken Duskwights from the darkness that plagued their hearts. Unfortunately, it would seem Nashmeira was wounded in battle. Ranaa quickly rushes to her teacher's side to examine her wounds, and you decide to join her.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez vaincu l'être éthéré, non sans quelques difficultés. Allez aider Ranaa à soigner les blessures de Nashmeira.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_06<tab>The battle won, you take a moment to reflect and recuperate with your fellow members of Troupe Falsiam. At Ranaa's request, you agree to return to the Adders' Nest to report your experiences while she tends to Mistress Nashmeira's wounds.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_06<tab>Elles vous ont demandé d'aller rapporter les faits à l'ordre des Deux Vipères. Allez trouver l'officier posté au quartier général.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_07<tab>Having at last confirmed matters with her own eyes, Mistress Nashmeira finally reveals to you the truth of the matter. What you have witnessed in Ul'dah and Gridania is none other than a phenomenon called the Totentanz, described ominously as the dance of the damned. As the Troupe Falsiam principal tells it, it is an aetheric manifestation that both arises from and feeds on the anger and fear in people's hearts, spreading across the land, taking over bodies and minds, and forcing unfortunate souls to perform a violent dance that often ends in their (and others') demise. She further explains that it is Troupe Falsiam's mission to wield the Kriegstanz to deliver the people of Eorzea from this menace, as her forebears have done time and again throughout history. Your calling as a dancer now crystal clear, you vow to redouble your training efforts, that you might be fully prepared for the confrontation that lies ahead.

※The next dancer quest will be available from Nashmeira upon reaching level 68.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SEQ_07<tab>Nashmeira s'est finalement décidée à vous révéler le secret de la Totentanz. Gavin, sous-lieutenant du serpent, vous a promis de demander de l'aide aux cités de l'Alliance pour que la troupe puisse continuer sa tournée et éradiquer le phénomène de la danse macabre. Faites-vous les dents sur quelques monstres de la région pour progresser dans votre art.
* Nashmeira propose la prochaine quête aux danseurs de niveau 68.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Nashmeira at the Adders' Nest in Gridania.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Nashmeira, au quartier général
 de l'ordre des Deux Vipères

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Nashmeira at Buscarron's Druthers.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_TODO_01<tab>Parler à Nashmeira, devant le Choix de Buscarron

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_TODO_02<tab>Keep lookout for suspicious Duskwights in the Shroud.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_TODO_02<tab>Faire le guet à l'endroit indiqué

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_TODO_03<tab>Defeat the aetheric shadow.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_TODO_03<tab>Terrasser l'étrange corps éthéré

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_TODO_04<tab>Rescue Nashmeira.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_TODO_04<tab>Aider Ranaa Mihgo à soigner Nashmeira

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_TODO_05<tab>Report to the officer at the Adders' Nest.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_TODO_05<tab>Rapporter les faits à l'ordre des Deux Vipères

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_000<tab>Please forgive me for my carelessness back in Stonesthrow. It's like Mistress Nashmeira said─I let overconfidence get the better of me. I promise it won't happen again.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_000<tab>Je suis désolée pour ce qui s'est passé à Lance-pierre... Je vais tout reprendre à zéro et m'assurer de ne plus laisser ma vanité prendre le dessus. En commençant par donner le meilleur de moi-même pour notre reprrrésentation à Ul'dah.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_KUIHLUD_000_005<tab>Though performing on stage may seem routine to us, for our audience each show is a once-in-a-lifetime experience. We must never forget this, and strive to always be at our best.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_KUIHLUD_000_005<tab>Nous saltimbanques, nous ne nous produisons jamais devant les mêmes personnes. Nous n'avons pas le droit à l'erreur, car nous n'avons qu'une seule chance de toucher le cœur de notre public.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_010<tab>It is good to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You'll be pleased to hear that our exhibition in the sultanate was a rousing success. Ranaa gave quite the inspired performance─it would seem the girl has indeed taken her lessons to heart.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_010<tab>Notre spectacle uldien s'est déroulé à la perfection<var 1D /var>! Ranaa est restée humble et a été excellente, une danseuse digne de ce nom<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_011<tab>That leaves Gridania as the final stop on our three-nation tour. I meant to depart immediately, but I must confess that the curious developments in Ul'dah have given me pause.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_011<tab>Il ne nous reste plus que Gridania et nous aurons terminé la première partie de notre tournée. Mais j'ai un mauvais pres<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ment...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_012<tab>Upon our arrival, let us first pay a visit to the Adders' Nest and inquire as to any strange happenings about town. Do not ask me why, but I believe it is best we stay vigilant.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_012<tab>Je voudrais connaître la situation sur place avant de prendre la route. Dirigeons-nous vers le quartier général de l'ordre des Deux Vipères, la grande compagnie de Gridania.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_020<tab>So this is Gridania. The forest is beautiful indeed, but I can't help but feel something ominous in the air...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_020<tab>Il paraît qu'il y a du grrrabuge à Gridania...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_KUIHLUD_000_023<tab>Considering everything that's gone wrong, Mistress Nashmeira is remarkably composed. I suppose that's why she leads this outfit and I just pound the drums...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_KUIHLUD_000_023<tab>Je trouve madame Nashmeira bien sereine, alors qu'on entend pas mal de rumeurs in<var 16 /var>quié<var 16 /var>tan<var 16 /var>tes à propos de Gridania...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SERPENTRECRUIT03252_000_025<tab>Under normal circumstances, Gridania would be more than willing to host any performance provided it does not anger the elementals. However, I fear our current situation is far from normal...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SERPENTRECRUIT03252_000_025<tab>En temps normal, nous n'aurions vu aucun inconvénient à ce que vous donniez une repré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tion de danse, du moment que vous ne dérangiez pas les esprits de la forêt...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_040<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I am sorry to say that my fears appear to have been well founded. Gridania, too, has seen its fair share of social unrest of late. Pray explain the situation to my colleagues, good sir.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_040<tab>Mon mauvais pres<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ment s'est finalement avéré...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SERPENTRECRUIT03252_000_041<tab>You are familiar with the Duskwight, yes? They are a clan of Elezen who eschew the shackles of urban life and instead choose to live in isolation. For the most part, both sides choose to leave the other well enough alone.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SERPENTRECRUIT03252_000_041<tab>Nous avons eu vent qu'une faction de mercenaires hors-la-loi tenaient une espèce de réunion aux abords de la forêt en ce moment même.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SERPENTRECRUIT03252_100_041<tab>Recently, however, events have taken a troubling turn. Groups of Duskwights have been assembling for reasons unknown, holding secret gatherings on the outskirts of the forest. Whatever their aim, we can be quite certain that it is nothing good.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SERPENTRECRUIT03252_100_041<tab>Ces mercenaires sont les descendants des habitants qui ont refusé d'obéir aux esprits de la forêt lors de la fondation de Gridania, et qui ont choisi de vivre dans des grottes souterraines.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SERPENTRECRUIT03252_101_041<tab>The Twin Adder is content to let them be provided they do us no harm, but when they turn to thieving and threatening our way of life...we cannot simply turn a blind eye. To say that tensions between the Duskwights and our citizens have been rising would be an understatement.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SERPENTRECRUIT03252_101_041<tab>Eux se voient comme des individus libres de leurs choix, mais pour nous ils restent des hors-la-loi. Comme ils comptent des voleurs et autres coupe-jarrets dans leurs rangs, il y a depuis toujours une animosité entre eux et les Gridaniens.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SERPENTRECRUIT03252_000_042<tab>To this point, troublemakers among the Duskwight have primarily acted alone. Which makes the manner in which they are now plotting something together in plain sight all the more concerning. Some here in the Nest even believe that they are sowing the seeds for a violent uprising.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SERPENTRECRUIT03252_000_042<tab>Vous vous doutez bien qu'ils ne se réunissent pas pour discuter menuiserie... Nous avons peur qu'ils ne soient en train d'organiser quelque rébellion...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_043<tab>As fortune would have it, these Duskwight rabble-rousers have recently been sighted with particular frequency in the immediate vicinity of the venue where I had hoped to hold our performance.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_043<tab>Leur groupe a été aperçu non loin du lieu que nous avions choisi pour notre spectacle. Comprenez qu'ils ne peuvent nous y autoriser l'accès dans ces conditions.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_044<tab>Needless to say, we must address the immediate danger before we can even think of going forward with our performance. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Ranaa...what say we investigate the matter? <var 1A 02 /var>Together<var 1A 01 /var>, this time.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_044<tab>Ranaa, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, la troupe va encore avoir besoin de vous pour régler ce problème...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_045<tab>Consider it done! I'll make up for my failure─just you watch me! Once I've soothed the Duskwights' hearts with my dance, rioting will be the furthest thing from their minds!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_045<tab>Vous pouvez compter sur moi, Madame Nashmeira<var 1D /var>! Je ferrrai tout pour me racheter après ce fiasco à Ul'dah...... Laissez-moi m'occuper d'apaiser les mercenaires<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_100_046<tab>Thank you, friends. That settles it, then. Leave the matter of the Duskwight demagogues to my colleagues here.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_100_046<tab>Merci, vous deux. Faisons appel à notre danse pour aider les hors-la-loi à calmer leur colère.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SERPENTRECRUIT03252_101_046<tab>I suppose there would be some merit in delegating the task to you, rather than risk fanning the flames between the Duskwights and our own citizens. And yet...you are a <var 1A 02 /var>dance<var 1A 01 /var> troupe, are you not? Are you certain that your friends here are up to the task of suppressing an armed revolt?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_SERPENTRECRUIT03252_101_046<tab>Toutes nos tentatives de pourparlers se sont soldées par des échecs, mais c'est vrai que nous aurons peut-être de meilleurs résultats en faisant intervenir des personnes étrangères à Gridania... Soyez prudents, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_046<tab>You can be assured they are. For what it is worth, I too will be accompanying Ranaa and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> to ensure that everything is in order. Besides, there is something that I would confirm with my own eyes...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_046<tab>Ne vous inquiétez pas, je serai là pour les aider. J'ai besoin de vérifier un détail en personne.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_047<tab>And with that, we should be on our way. The Duskwights in question are said to be congregating in the South Shroud. Let us meet first at the local tavern and formulate a plan of attack.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_047<tab>Ne perdons pas de temps, et allons à la rencontre des mercenaires, dans la Forêt du sud. Retrouvons-nous au bar appelé “Le Choix de Buscarron”.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_KUIHLUD_000_060<tab>As one who has accompanied Ranaa in all of her recent performances, you have my word. The girl has taken her lessons to heart, and will not make the same mistake again. Yet it would seem our dear leader is not quite convinced...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_KUIHLUD_000_060<tab>Vous pouvez me croire sur parole, Ranaa a beaucoup appris de ses erreurs à Ul'dah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_065<tab>Does Mistress Nashmeira have to follow us <var 1A 02 /var>everywhere<var 1A 01 /var>? And what was that about her wanting to see something with her own eyes...?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_065<tab>À ton avis, qu'est-ce que madame Nashmeira veut vérrrifier<var 1D /var>? Elle a dit qu'elle nous ac<var 16 /var>com<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>gnait pour nous aider, mais je suis sûre que ce n'est pas sa seule raison de nous escorter.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_080<tab>According to one of the regulars here, the Duskwight troublemakers were seen not long ago just to the northeast of here. And that's not all─a rumor says that they were, and I quote, “gyrating and undulating in a most curious way.”
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_080<tab>J'ai interrogé quelques personnes dans le bar, et j'ai appris que les mercenaires avaient été aperçus au nord-est de la ville. Et... il semblerait qu'on les ait vus en train de danser bizarrement.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_081<tab>Whatever it was that we witnessed in Thanalan, it seems likely that it's afflicted the people here as well. We must investigate the matter with all speed. Come, now.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_081<tab>J'ai bien peur que ce soit le même phénomène qu'à Ul'dah... Nous devons nous en assurer, Ranaa, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Allons trouver ces mercenaires.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_090<tab>Why, we're halfway across the realm from Ul'dah! Why would these “Duskwights” be performing the same dance as the paupers in Stonesthrow? Somehow I can't shake this feeling Mistress Nashmeira knows more than she's letting on...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_090<tab>Je me demande si la danse des mercenaires est la même danse étrrrange que j'ai vue dans le Thanalan... On dirait que madame Nashmeira sait quelque chose...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_095<tab>This is where the Duskwights were last sighted...or so I was told.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_095<tab>C'est par ici que se trouveraient les personnes que nous cherchons.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_150<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Mistress Nashmeira! I think I saw something. Over there, behind the bushes...!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_150<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Madame Nashmeira<var 1D /var>! J'ai aperrrçu une ombre derrière les bosquets... Approchons-nous dis<var 16 /var>crè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_200<tab>That's it! That's the same creepy dance I saw in Ul'dah!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_200<tab>C'est cette danse révoltante<var 1D /var>! La même que celle des rrrebelles de Lance-pierre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_201<tab>The dance of the damned. Yes, it is just as I feared...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_201<tab>J'en étais sûre... C'est la Totentanz, la danse macabre.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_202<tab>I'll explain everything in good time. For the moment, just leave them to me!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_202<tab>Je vous expliquerai tout ça un peu plus tard, pour le moment j'ai une théorie à vérifier.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_EXCITEDDUSKWIGHT03252_000_203<tab>Hm!? Begone, meddlers. Leave us to our dancing.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_EXCITEDDUSKWIGHT03252_000_203<tab>Dégage, toi<var 1D /var>! Laisse-nous danser tranquille.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_EXCITEDDUSKWIGHT03252_000_204<tab>Wh-What in the...!? My legs...it's as if they have a mind of their own!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_EXCITEDDUSKWIGHT03252_000_204<tab>Qu-qu'est-ce qui se passe<var 1D /var>? J-j'ai chaud tout d'un coup...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_205<tab>Mistress Nashmeira, look out!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_205<tab>Non<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_240<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'll tend to Mistress Nashmeira! You deal with...whatever <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> is!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_240<tab>Je vais aider madame Nashmeira<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, occupe-toi du trrruc noir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_245<tab>...How embarrassing.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_245<tab>J-je... J'ai été imprudente...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_250<tab>Good work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Still, whatever in the world <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> that?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_250<tab>Merci de t'être occupé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de ce monstrrre, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Mais, c'était quoi au juste<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_260<tab>Forgive me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...and thank you. And to think I was scolding poor Ranaa for <var 1A 02 /var>her<var 1A 01 /var> overconfidence. In my heyday, I would have made short work of that thing, but alas...those days are long behind me.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_260<tab>Merci de m'avoir sauvée... On dirait que je suis mal placée pour réprimander Ranaa, j'ai surestimé mes talents moi aussi...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_261<tab>Don't be too hard on yourself, Mistress Nashmeira. We all have our bad days, and besides, it's not as if you were just being reckless like me. But never mind that...what in the world did I just see!?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_261<tab>Mais pas du tout, vous ne vous êtes pas jetée dans la gueule du loup comme je l'ai fait... Mais cette danse macabrrre, et cet éther noir qui est sorti des mercenaires, c'était quoi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_262<tab>That creepy dance, that strange cloud of black aether... What does all of this mean, Mistress Nashmeira!? Come now, I know you know more than you've let on!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_262<tab>Madame Nashmeirrra, vous savez de quoi il s'agit, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_263<tab>I do, and I fully intend to share my knowledge with you...once I have seen what I must see with my own two eyes. In the meantime, someone should hand over these men to the Twin Adders.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_263<tab>Oui, et c'est malheureusement ce que je craignais... Je vais tout vous expliquer, mais allons d'abord prévenir l'ordre des Deux Vipères pour qu'ils viennent chercher les mercenaires évanouis.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_264<tab>I suppose you're right. And we must treat your wounds as well!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_264<tab>Vous avez raison. Et puis nous devons nous occuper de votrrre plaie.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_265<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, could I ask you to return to the Adders' Nest and deliver our report? I'll tend to Mistress Nashmeira's scratches and see that no other troublemaking Duskwights show up.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_265<tab>Tu peux t'occuper d'aller prévenir les Deux Vipères, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>? Je vais rester ici pour garder un œil sur les rrrebelles, et aider à soigner la blessure de madame Nashmeira.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_280<tab>To think my reflexes have slowed to this degree in my time away from the stage. I must resume my training once my wounds heal, before I embarrass myself any further...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_280<tab>Je n'aurais jamais cru être aussi rouillée... Je crois que je vais recommencer à m'entraîner.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_285<tab>Would you be so kind as to return to Gridania and report back to Lieutenant Gavin? I'll attend to Mistress Nashmeira's scratches and keep my eyes out for any troublemaking Duskwights.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_285<tab>Tu peux t'occuper d'aller prévenir les Deux Vipères, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>? Je vais rester ici pour garder un œil sur les rrrebelles, et aider à soigner la blessure de madame Nashmeira.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_KUIHLUD_000_290<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You return alone? Don't tell me something happened to Ranaa and our dear leader...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_KUIHLUD_000_290<tab>Mais... vous revenez tout<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> seul<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_GAVIN_000_300<tab>What's this? You apprehended the Duskwight miscreants for us? Splendid! On behalf of all of Gridania, you have our gratitude. We will dispatch a unit to the South Shroud at once.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_GAVIN_000_300<tab>Comment<var 1D /var>!? Vous avez réussi à capturer les mercenaires<var 1D /var>? D'accord, je vais im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment déployer mes soldats pour aller les chercher. Merci pour votre aide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_320<tab>My apologies for the delay, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'm pleased to report that our dancing Duskwight friends have been handed over to the proper authorities. And Ranaa's patched up my wounds good as new─with sufficient rest, I should be back on the stage in no time.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_320<tab>Les Deux Vipères ont bien récupéré les mercenaires, et grâce aux soins rapides de Ranaa, ma blessure ne sera pas trop grave.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_321<tab>Not on my watch, you won't! I mean, pray do not overexert yourself, Mistress Nashmeira. You need your rest. I told you I could have handed over the culprits myself...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_321<tab>Ce n'est pas une raison pour être dérrraisonnable<var 1D /var>! Vous auriez pu vous reposer pendant que l'ordre des Deux Vipères s'occupait du reste...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_322<tab>I know, Ranaa. And yet, I wanted to be there myself when they awoke. It played out exactly as I expected─they remembered little or nothing about their dancing, their secret gatherings, or any of the conversations that led up to it all.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_322<tab>Je voulais voir comment ils se comporteraient quand ils reviendraient à eux... Et, comme je m'en doutais, ils ne se souvenaient pas pourquoi ils avaient commencé à fomenter une rébellion, ni pourquoi ils dansaient...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_GAVIN_000_323<tab>Just being stubborn, no doubt. Worry not, friends. The Twin Adders will carry out a proper interrogation. And yet, one thing concerns me. Is it true that these events bear a striking similarity to a situation you witnessed in Ul'dah?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_GAVIN_000_323<tab>Ne vous inquiétez pas, nous allons continuer de les interroger. Et sinon, j'ai entendu dire que le même genre d'incident avait eu lieu à Ul'dah, c'est vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_324<tab>What we have witnessed is none other than the Totentanz─the dance of the damned. And it is our gods-given duty as dancers to see that it is never danced again.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_324<tab>J'ai pu le confirmer en voyant les mercenaires, ces gens ont été victimes de la danse macabre qu'on appelle Totentanz. C'est une horrible affliction, que les danseurs ont le devoir de combattre.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_325<tab>The dance of the damned? Our <var 1A 02 /var>mission<var 1A 01 /var>? Whatever are you rambling about, Mistress Nashmeira? I thought our mission was to lend strength and succor to the suffering, and lift the spirits of the realm?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_325<tab>Mais, notre mission la plus imporrrtante n'est-elle pas d'apaiser le cœur du public en utilisant la Kriegstanz<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_326<tab>...That it is. And yet the truth of exactly what this entails runs far deeper. Throughout our storied history, the dancers of Troupe Falsiam have saved countless lands time and again from a fate most dire.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_326<tab>C'est exactement ça. Mais n'oublie pas que plutôt que de leur offrir un soulagement temporaire, notre but premier est de combattre et d'éliminer la cause de leur mal-être.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_327<tab>When war and calamity ravage the land, fear and anger fill men's hearts. These emotions fester, reacting with the aether around us─in the air we breathe, the ground beneath our feet─to form an aetheric manifestation of malaise that spreads like a dark cloud across the land.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_327<tab>Dans les régions ravagées par les guerres, lorsque les peurs et les craintes des habitants sont à leur paroxysme, les idées noires qui sommeillent au plus profond de leurs âmes se mêlent aux courants terrestres et aériens de l'éther environnant et se propagent à une vitesse effarante.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_328<tab>The weak, the downtrodden, the scorned and suffering... Sadly, it is these people who are oft the quickest to fall prey to dark despair. Left unchecked, the shadow fully consumes them. Their hearts, their minds...in the end, even control of their very limbs is taken from them.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_328<tab>Les premières victimes sont toujours les plus pauvres, rendus plus fragiles par la rudesse de leurs vies. Les ténèbres les consument et gagnent ainsi assez d'influence pour affecter tout le monde.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_329<tab>Stripped of the last semblances of sanity, they flail about in a manner most hideous. Tales tell of mothers blissfully unaware as they trampled their beloved children... Men who danced so violently they ripped the limbs from their own body. This is the Totentanz─the dance of the damned...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_329<tab>Les gens touchés par ces ténèbres finissent par perdre la raison, danser de façon in<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>trô<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>ble, et agir selon leurs plus noirs désirs. C'est ce qu'on appelle la Totentanz, la danse macabre.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_GAVIN_000_330<tab>Wh-What madness is this!? If you speak true, and this damnable dance you speak of arises from the fear and anger in people's hearts, why did it not manifest itself in the wake of the Calamity, in Eorzea's darkest hour?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_GAVIN_000_330<tab>Je comprends ce que vous dites, mais comment expliquez-vous que ce phénomène ne se déclenche que maintenant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_331<tab>Call me mad, but I think I understand. In times of greatest crisis, just surviving for another day requires all the strength we can muster. People have neither the time nor the freedom of mind to dwell on emotions like hatred or anger...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_331<tab>J-je pense que je sais pourquoi. C'est parce que quand une catastrrrophe arrive, l'instinct de survie prend le dessus, et ne laisse pas le temps aux gens de réfléchir ou de s'inquiéter de leur futur.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_332<tab>Ranaa has the right of it. It is precisely at this time─a time when Eorzea has made great strides in its recovery, yet deeper wounds still go undressed─that your people are most susceptible to that damnable dance.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_332<tab>C'est tout à fait ça. C'est maintenant que la région se remet petit à petit de la guerre contre l'Empire et du septième fléau que les probabilités de manifestation de la danse macabre sont les plus élevées.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_333<tab>So that is why our art was born so many ages ago. Not just to drive out the darkness from people's hearts in a figurative sense, but to literally cast out aetheric shadows, and free the afflicted from the clutches of the Totentanz.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_333<tab>Est-ce que ça veut dire que la Kriegstanz a été inventée spécifiquement pour combattrrre ce phénomène<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_334<tab>Yes. This is the truth of Troupe Falsiam, passed down from principal to principal for generations. What I did for the Duskwights was to use my dance to extract the darkness from their hearts, and give it physical form. Form that can then be struck down and banished.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_334<tab>Oui, c'est un art qui se passe de meneur en meneur depuis la création de la troupe. La danse qui force les ténèbres à se matérialiser hors du corps de la personne ensorcelée, et que j'ai utilisée sur le mercenaire, en fait partie.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_335<tab>It has been several centuries since the menace of the Totentanz last reared its ugly head. To be honest, when we first came to Eorzea, I was unsure as to what we would encounter. So as not to worry the two of you overmuch, I kept the truth from you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_335<tab>Cependant, il y avait des siècles que nous n'avions plus eu affaire à la Totentanz. J'ai décidé de faire cette tournée éorzéenne juste au cas où, mais je dois dire que je ne m'attendais pas à vraiment devoir y faire face.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_336<tab>Yet now that I have seen it with my own eyes, our mission could not be more clear. As the inheritors of the Kriegstanz, we must chase the shadow of the Totentanz from this realm. I beg forgiveness for the secrecy, my friends, and ask that you lend me your aid.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_336<tab>Mais maintenant que j'en ai acquis la certitude, je ne peux pas rester les bras croisés<var 1D /var>! Et je vais avoir besoin de votre aide, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Ranaa<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_Q1_000_100<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_Q1_000_100<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_A1_000_100<tab>You can count on me.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_A1_000_100<tab>Vous pouvez compter sur moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_A2_000_100<tab>Fine. But no more secrets...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_A2_000_100<tab>D'accord, mais plus de secrets, hein<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_340<tab>Of course you can count on us! After all, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I are dancers of Troupe Falsiam, too! And it's like you always say: a dancer never abandons her partner. Why should you have to carry the burden of saving the whole realm all by yourself?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_340<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> et moi-même sommes tou<var 08 E905 ((tes)) ((s)) /var> deux des danse<var 08 E905 ((uses)) ((urs)) /var>, Madame Nashmeira. Bien sûr que nous vous aiderons à combattre la danse macabre. Mais vous devez nous promettrrre de ne plus tout prendre sur vous.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_341<tab>Ranaa... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... After all of my harsh words and hidden truths, you are far too kind.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_341<tab>Je savais que je pouvais compter sur vous<var 1D /var>! Merci<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_GAVIN_000_342<tab>I must confess that I still am struggling to understand all this, but one thing is clear: this dancing epidemic you speak of poses a grave danger to our realm. I will contact the other Grand Companies immediately and apprise them of the threat.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_GAVIN_000_342<tab>Même si nous vous laissons vous en occuper sur le terrain, nous devrions prévenir les autres régions de ce risque, et coopérer pour éliminer cette menace.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_GAVIN_000_343<tab>Should there be any reports of similar phenomena in other nations, we would like to call upon you to deal with the matter. Forgive us the imposition, but clearly this is beyond our ability.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_GAVIN_000_343<tab>L'ordre des Deux Vipères va prévenir chaque cité de l'Alliance, et je vais m'occuper personnellement de demander leur col<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>bo<var 16 /var>ra<var 16 /var>tion pour le reste de votre tournée.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_344<tab>Leave it to us. Nothing would honor us more than if the nations of Eorzea would place their trust in Troupe Falsiam, and allow us to perform for their people.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_344<tab>Cela nous rendrait un fier service<var 1D /var>! Combattre la danse macabre sera grandement facilité si nous avons le soutien de tout Éorzéa.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_350<tab>And with that, only Ishgard and Ala Mhigo remain on our itinerary. Of the two, Ishgard has had more time for its people to recover from the scars of war. Let us make it our next destination.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_350<tab>Il ne nous reste plus qu'Ishgard et Ala Mhigo... Je pense qu'il serait plus sage de commencer par Ishgard, qui doit tant bien que mal continuer à se remettre de sa guerre contre les dragons.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_355<tab>And with that, only Ishgard and Ala Mhigo remain on our itinerary. Ala Mhigo yet struggles to free itself from the Garlean yoke. We have no choice but to make Ishgard our next destination.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_355<tab>Il ne nous reste plus qu'Ishgard et Ala Mhigo... Seulement pour le moment nous n'avons aucun moyen de pénétrer dans la seconde, toujours sous domination impériale. Commençons d'abord par Ishgard.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_356<tab>And with that, only Ishgard and Ala Mhigo remain on our itinerary. Yet Ishgard's borders remain closed to outsiders, and Ala Mhigo still struggles under the Garlean yoke. We will have to rely on our friends here at the Twin Adders to secure us passage.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_356<tab>Il ne nous reste plus qu'Ishgard et Ala Mhigo... Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment aucune de ces deux cités n'acceptent de visiteurs étrangers... Nous n'avons plus qu'à attendre de voir s'ils répondent favorablement à la demande d'aide des Deux Vipères.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_360<tab>At any rate, we will need more time to properly prepare for the confrontation ahead. In the meantime, Ranaa, you are to continue your performances. You require more practice still before I can bequeath to you all the secrets of the Kriegstanz.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_360<tab>Dans tous les cas, nous avons besoin d'un peu de temps. Ranaa, pendant que nous attendons les résultats de la demande de coopération, je veux que tu continues ton en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_100_361<tab>You can count on me, Mistress Nashmeira!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_100_361<tab>C'est comprrris<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_361<tab>And you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─pray continue to hone your skills in battle. If we hope to prevail against the Totentanz, we will need your martial skills as much as we need your dancing.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_361<tab>Quant à vous, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je veux que vous continuiez à améliorer vos techniques de combat.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_362<tab>For no, it is not enough that we lure the shadows out of people's hearts. We must dispel the darkness for good, lest it simply drift on until it finds another unsuspecting host. Yes, we will be needing your strength more than ever.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_362<tab>Ça ne sert à rien d'extraire les ténèbres du cœur des gens si on ne peut pas les vaincre ensuite. C'est vous qui avez la plus grande expérience au combat, c'est donc à vous que je veux confier cette tâche.

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_363<tab>And with that, I, too, should prepare myself. Our true last act draws ever closer at hand.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_NASHMEIRA_000_363<tab>Nous avons très peu de temps, organisons-le efficacement. Des épreuves difficiles nous attendent...

source: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_260<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBB221_03252_RANAAMIHGO_000_260<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
